children.name: content
children.label: Content
children.default: HotWax Systems offers a full set of services supporting at custom solution design and development.  With 20 years of enterprise application development experience, offices and key individuals on four continents, and a deep commitment to open source software, HotWax is uniquely positioned to encourage project success. Whether the solution is designed from scratch, or is an update to current infrastructure, the process moves expertly, with speed and precision.

default.heading: Full Service Support
